summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Solutech Global Consultancy website. Backend APIs fully functional (100% success rate), frontend UI/UX working well with professional design. Contact form integration with backend API working correctly. All required features implemented per problem statement.
passed_tests: Contact form API (/api/contact POST) - Successfully saves and sends emails
Get contacts API (/api/contacts GET) - Returns saved data
Homepage loads with all sections (Hero, Services, Why Us, About, Clients, Testimonials, Contact)
Navigation links scroll to correct sections
Service cards display all 4 services (GST, Accounting, Income Tax, Virtual Accountant)
Contact form displays with all required fields (name, email, service dropdown, reason)
Service dropdown shows all 5 options including 'Other'
Form validation shows error for empty fields
Mobile menu button present and functional
Testimonials section shows 3 testimonials with 5-star ratings
Client badges section shows 5 client types
Contact information displays correctly (Kolkata, India location)
